title: Bruce4
author: Bruce4
content: Do you know what the most dangerous lie in the world is? "I CAN'T"It's the falsehood most people say always to persuade themselves not to take risks that mightMake them uncomfortable or cause them to experience some perceived failure in life.Saying "I CAN'T" to every task and responsibility to life is one of the banes obstructing people from achieving their goal in life.  It could be translated to doubting yourself,and submitting to defeat.It signals impossibility and renders you helpless.it is the lack of Self confidence that unables you to access and embrace your true self.it puts you at a higher risk by making you believe declining is the Best option. Let go of the words "I CAN'T" and instead embrace the truth of believing in yourself by developing a positive thinking mindset,new Skills,attitudes and actions that can have a positive impact on your life and your overall wellbeing.With that,you can achieve your biggest goal and create a life you love.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Yes I agree don’t live your life saying "I can’t". You should live your life saying, "I can". That “I can” is being positive, that it can lead one to infinite possibilities in life. Having a positive attitude is healthy mentally and physically. Whether you are in a sour situation, remaining hopeful, and having self-confidence will make things better. I also think that having an inner circle that can help you reach a goal is essential. Taking optimistic perception can lead you through a dark tunnel where you can see at the end there is a bright light. With that mindset above you can only show the “I can” approach to a better life.

comments.author: Dinda mayasi
comments.body: ;)I agree with your perspective. "I can't" is a limiting belief that can prevent people from achieving their full potential. It can hold them back from trying new things, taking risks, and pursuing their goals. By embracing a growth mindset and focusing on what they can do instead of what they can't, people can overcome their limitations and achieve great things. Developing a positive attitude and taking action towards one's goals can help build self-confidence and lead to success in all areas of life.
